titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 986) to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Eightmile River in the State of Connecticut as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-264, by Ms. Castor.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 986 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 94.

action.text: Considered as privileged matter. (consideration: CR 7/31/2007 H8900-8905)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 580.
Considered as unfinished business. (consideration: CR 7/31/2007 H8938-8939)
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 188 (Roll no. 759). (consideration: CR 7/31/2007 H8904-8905, H8938)

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 184 (Roll no. 760). (text: CR 7/31/2007 H8900)

bill.summary: 7/30/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 986 (Eightmile Wild and Scenic River Act).
